attributes.action: To give FIBROMYALGIA a chance to be researched so us sufferers can get help
attributes.additional_details: Just like any condition that hasn't had the relevant research we have nowhere to turn. Its about time we are listened to.
attributes.background: Acknowledgement for the condition of FIBROMYALGiA- GP education. Social education. Research. And to have the DWP acknowledge a condition that causes widespread pain that interferes with a lot of peoples daily life.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. 

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. 

You could start a new petition asking for the Government to fund more research into fibromyalgia and/or run an awareness campaign aimed at healthcare professionals and the public, if that's what you want to happen.
